bibl.title: The "Peri Demosthenous" of Didymos Grammatikos.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Washington. Summary in DA 52 (1991-1992) p. 529-A. - P. Berol. Inv. 9780 = B.K.T. I (= Pack2 339). The body of the dissertation takes the form of a commentary in which the author elucidates on a point-by-point basis the historical, rhetorical and etymological material which Didymos presents.
OSBORNE Kelly Thomas, The "Peri Demosthenous" of Didymos Grammatikos.
